mapper.select: select member_count as memberCount,merchant_count as merchantCount,gmt_report as gmtReport from report_user_reg_daily where year(gmt_report)=#{year} and month(gmt_report)=#{month}
select member_count as memberCount,merchant_count as merchantCount,gmt_report as gmtReport from report_user_reg_month where year(gmt_report)=#{year}
